projects.name: BetterDocs (React)
projects.excerpt: BetterDocs is a small side project solely made by me; it is a popular community based showcase website made in React along with Gatsbyjs and has PWA (offline) support with an intuitive design for responsiveness for all screen sizes.

projects.name: BetterDocs (Jekyll)
projects.excerpt: A static and deprecated version of BetterDocs React made initially in Jekyll. Technologies used were Ruby, Jekyll, Javascript, Netlify, Netlify CMS, Jquery, SASS/SCSS.

projects.name: Github ReDesign Concept
projects.excerpt: A modern theme for Github. Google's Material Design was kept in mind for most of the project whilst adding their current content in a fresh and modern look without altering the work flow.
